column4: i'd like X to start up with a resolution of 1280x960 ... but i can't go higher than 1024x768 ... here's my xorg.cong : http://paste.ubuntulinux.nl/2014 (i use breezy)
- maybe re-run the X configuration, anyone remember the command?
it's dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg, and i already did it :-D
